title: First-floor two-bedroom in Theater District
posting_body: This apartment is on the lobby level of a vintage, well-maintained apartment building, conveniently located two blocks from Union Square in the Theater District.
The elevator system was recently modernized and converted to digital controls.
We are near many transit lines, tech shuttles, restaurants, stores, medical offices, and other businesses.
The building has a basement laundry room open for residents 24/7, with three washers and four dryers.
After entering the apartment, you come to the kitchen on your right and the bathroom on your left.
There is also a hallway closet on the left.
Keep going straight
and you come to the living room, which connects with the two bedrooms.
Each bedroom has two windows and a big closet with sliding doors.
The floors in the rooms are red oak hardwood, except for the kitchen and bathroom, which are  tiled.
The kitchen has a four-burner gas range with hood above, a refrigerator and a sink with cabinetry above.
If you want more information or want to arrange a private showing, please call me at
show contact info
(between 9 am and 7 pm) or send me an email.
I will follow social distancing and masking protocols during the showings.
No pets, no smoking.
12-month lease.
Ask about a move-in discount.
Geoff Polk
520 Taylor manager
